text: aur vahee apane bandon par poora-poora qaaboo rakhanevaala hai aur vah tumapar nigaraanee karanevaale ko niyukt karake bhejata hai, yahaan tak ki jab tumamen se kisee kee mrtyu aa jaatee hai, jo hamaare bheje hue kaaryakartta use apane qabze mein kar lete hai aur ve koee kotaahee nahin karate
